course_description: First semester of Advanced Chinese. The course emphasizes advanced reading, grammar, and conversation. Authentic materials are included, such as news articles, television, fiction, and film. Students will learn to read both traditional and simplified characters. For non-heritage students only.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2093, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 10-10:50a, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
